pages.title: ⤝ Three of Swords ⤝
pages.text: Spirit of Sorrow$(br)     ♄ Saturn in ♎ Libra

Three swords piercing a heart; clouds and rain move behind.$(br)  We get a sense of the pain taking over, driving away our humanity.$(br)  Anyone who has ever gone through a period of emotional pain will know the feeling of being 'stabbed in the heart'.$(br)  With a focus on that feeling, life can become overwhelming, pierced by all-encompassing anguish.

$(l)Divinatory meanings$()$(br)  Removal, rupture, dispersion.$(br)  Pain, sadness, possible emotional disturbance.$(br2)$(l)Reversed$()$(br)  Distraction, confusion.$(br)  Release from sorrow or depression.
